title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7905.5 - Penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7905.5 - Penalties

State Regulations
(a) Any person who
violates any provision of these regulations, or of any order issued pursuant
thereto, shall be liable to the people of the State for a civil penalty in an
amount of not less than two thousand five hundred dollars nor more than ten
thousand dollars for every such violation. (b) In addition to the penalties provided by
subdivision (a) of this section, any person filing a false written statement
with a County Energy Coordinator or the State Energy Office in connection with

State set-aside operations shall be subject to criminal penalties as provided
by the New York State Penal Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

7905.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
